settings.content:
We are building our transparency report. Stay tuned on our Social Channels to learn when we launch it. In the meantime, check our Circular Roadmap right here.

---

We are big on Transparency. This is why we are working on our Transparency Report, to allow you to get to know us well - that's also how you are building trust. We are not planning on hiding anything from anyone - on the contrary: please keep us accountable and keep asking questions. We are on this journey TOGETHER and we count on you to help us improve.

Join us on our journey of creating a truly responsible circular brand.

#LetsReloop
Have no fear of perfection. You will never reach it.
settings.author: Salvador Dali
